theWizard:Charge.NAME: Charge
theWizard:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 2 Mana to your hand.

theWizard:WrathOfGod.NAME: Wrath Of God
theWizard:WrathOfGod.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! extra damage for each Mana in your exhaust pile.

theWizard:SourceOfMana.NAME: Source Of Mana
theWizard:SourceOfMana.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 2 Mana to your hand.

theWizard:LightningStaff.NAME: Lightning Staff
theWizard:LightningStaff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Mana , deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

theWizard:Chant.NAME: Chant
theWizard:Chant.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards. NL Add !M! Mana to your hand.

theWizard:StaffWallop.NAME: Staff Wallop
theWizard:StaffWallop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Mcost 2: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak .

theWizard:Efficient.NAME: Efficient
theWizard:Efficient.DESCRIPTION: Mcost effects cost 1 less Mana this combat. (At most 1)
theWizard:Efficient.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Mcost effects cost 1 less Mana this combat. (At most 1)

theWizard:ManaPotion.NAME: Mana Potion
theWizard:ManaPotion.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! upgraded Mana to your hand.

theWizard:ManaControl.NAME: Mana Control
theWizard:ManaControl.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn, shuffle a Mana into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a Mana , draw !M! cards.

theWizard:IceShield.NAME: Ice Shield
theWizard:IceShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Mcost 1 : Apply !M! Cold to ALL enemies.

theWizard:WaveTheStaff.NAME: Wave The Staff
theWizard:WaveTheStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 3 Mana to your hand.

theWizard:Foretell.NAME: Foretell
theWizard:Foretell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your draw pile onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust .
theWizard:Foretell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate . NL Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your draw pile onto the top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:Thunderstorm.NAME: Thunderstorm
theWizard:Thunderstorm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Mana in your hand , for each deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theWizard:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
theWizard:Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Mana to your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

theWizard:Alchemy.NAME: Alchemy
theWizard:Alchemy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Mana in your hand , for each gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

theWizard:Escape.NAME: Escape
theWizard:Escape.DESCRIPTION: Gain a Smoke Bomb. NL Exhaust.

theWizard:FrozenForm.NAME: Frozen Form
theWizard:FrozenForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Mana , gain !M! Block.
theWizard:FrozenForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Mana , gain 3 Block. NL At the start of turn , gain 2 Cold .

theWizard:PlanB.NAME: Plan B
theWizard:PlanB.DESCRIPTION: Odd : Deal !D! damage. NL Even : Apply !M! Cold . NL Mcost 1 : Trigger both.

theWizard:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
theWizard:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the damage you take from enemies by half. NL Exhaust after !stslib:ex! uses.

theWizard:OddStrike.NAME: Odd Strike
theWizard:OddStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Odd : Gain [E] and draw 1 card.

theWizard:EvenDefend.NAME: Even Defend
theWizard:EvenDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Even : Draw 2 cards.

theWizard:Mathematician.NAME: Mathematician
theWizard:Mathematician.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if the size of your exhaust pile is not 0 and is divisible by 7. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times.
theWizard:Mathematician.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The size of the exhaust pile is not proper!

theWizard:LightSpeed.NAME: Light Speed
theWizard:LightSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Mana to hand. Whenever you exhaust a Mana this turn, draw 1 card. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:Focus.NAME: Focus
theWizard:Focus.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards and Add 3 Mana to your hand.

theWizard:Shield.NAME: Shield
theWizard:Shield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Mcost 1 : Gain !M! additional Block. NL Exhaust . NL Retain .

theWizard:PowerShield.NAME: Power Shield
theWizard:PowerShield.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn , add 1 *Shield to your hand.
theWizard:PowerShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn , add 1 upgraded *Shield to your hand.

theWizard:DoubleCast.NAME: Double Cast
theWizard:DoubleCast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Mcost 2 : Deal !D! damage again.

theWizard:HeadOnBlow.NAME: Head On Blow
theWizard:HeadOnBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle !M! Mana into your discard pile.

theWizard:Ignite.NAME: Ignite
theWizard:Ignite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Mcost 1 : Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theWizard:Calm.NAME: Calm
theWizard:Calm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Mana in your hand and discard other cards. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:ManaBurst.NAME: Mana Burst
theWizard:ManaBurst.DESCRIPTION: Add Mana to your hand until full , gain !B! Block for each Mana added. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:DarkMagic.NAME: Dark Magic
theWizard:DarkMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:SpellPreparation.NAME: Spell Preparation
theWizard:SpellPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next Mcost card you play this turn doesn't need Mana.

theWizard:Overheated.NAME: Overheated
theWizard:Overheated.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Mana exhausted this turn.

theWizard:MagicResistance.NAME: Magic Resistance
theWizard:MagicResistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Artifact . NL Exhaust .

theWizard:EnchantedBook.NAME: Enchanted Book
theWizard:EnchantedBook.DESCRIPTION: Odd : Gain !M! Strength. NL Even : Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Mcost 3 : Trigger both.

theWizard:Battery.NAME: Battery
theWizard:Battery.DESCRIPTION: Increase your max hand size by !M! .

theWizard:PredictTheFuture.NAME: Predict The Future
theWizard:PredictTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Put a *Void onto the top of your draw pile.

theWizard:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
theWizard:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: At the end of turn , NL Mcost !M! : Draw 2 extra cards next turn.
theWizard:Acceleration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of turn , NL Mcost !M! : Draw 2 extra cards next turn.

theWizard:FrostAttack.NAME: Frost Attack
theWizard:FrostAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Cold. Put this card on top of your draw pile. NL Can be played !theWizardM! times this turn.

theWizard:ColdJoke.NAME: Cold Joke
theWizard:ColdJoke.DESCRIPTION: If enemy doesn't have Cold , draw 1 card. NL Apply !M! Cold .

theWizard:Snowstorm.NAME: Snowstorm
theWizard:Snowstorm.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Mana in your hand , for each apply !M! Cold to ALL enemies.

theWizard:FreezeRay.NAME: Freeze Ray
theWizard:FreezeRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Cold equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Frostbite : Double the damage.

theWizard:AbsoluteZero.NAME: Absolute Zero
theWizard:AbsoluteZero.DESCRIPTION: Enemies' Cold no longer reduce at the end of turn.
theWizard:AbsoluteZero.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemies' Cold no longer reduce at the end of turn.

theWizard:Freeze.NAME: Freeze
theWizard:Freeze.DESCRIPTION: Apply Slow to enemy. NL Exhaust . Ethereal.
theWizard:Freeze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Slow to enemy. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:Coolant.NAME: Coolant
theWizard:Coolant.DESCRIPTION: Multiply enemy's Cold by 1.5. NL Mcost 2 : Multiply it by 2 instead.
theWizard:Coolant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Multiply enemy's Cold by 1.5. NL Mcost 1 : Multiply it by 2 instead.

theWizard:IceBlast.NAME: Ice Blast
theWizard:IceBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equals to double the enemy's Cold .

theWizard:ExponentStrike.NAME: Exponent Strike
theWizard:ExponentStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the damage dealt is greater than its base damage , set its base damage to that number. NL Frostbite : deal 170% damage.

theWizard:IceBreaker.NAME: Ice Breaker
theWizard:IceBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Frostbite : Draw 1 card and gain [E].

theWizard:IceStaff.NAME: Ice Staff
theWizard:IceStaff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! Cold.

theWizard:ArcaneScroll.NAME: Arcane Scroll
theWizard:ArcaneScroll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength this turn. Add a random Attack to your hand. NL Mcost 2: Add another random Attack. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:SupremeScroll.NAME: Supreme Scroll
theWizard:SupremeScroll.DESCRIPTION: Add X random card to your hand. They cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust .
theWizard:SupremeScroll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 random card to your hand. They cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:Mastery.NAME: Mastery
theWizard:Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever a Mcost effect triggers , return this from the discard pile to your hand.

theWizard:Combo.NAME: Combo
theWizard:Combo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each Mana exhausted this turn.

theWizard:SpellImprovement.NAME: Spell Improvement
theWizard:SpellImprovement.DESCRIPTION: Apply !theWizardM! Cold . NL Permanently increase this card's number by !M!. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:AncientSpell.NAME: Ancient Spell
theWizard:AncientSpell.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust at most !M! Mana in your hand , for each gain [E] and draw 1 card. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:BeamClash.NAME: Beam Clash
theWizard:BeamClash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your have no less than 10 cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Mcost 2 : Deal !M! more damage.

theWizard:OverloadedDefend.NAME: Overloaded Defend
theWizard:OverloadedDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Shuffle 2 Mana into discard pile.

theWizard:ColdDisaster.NAME: Cold Disaster
theWizard:ColdDisaster.DESCRIPTION: Enemies take equal damage when Cold automatically reduce at the end of turn.

theWizard:Worsen.NAME: Worsen
theWizard:Worsen.DESCRIPTION: Apply Poison equal to the enemy's Cold. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:MultiFunction.NAME: Multi Function
theWizard:MultiFunction.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 Mana to your hand. NL Odd : Apply !theWizardM! Cold to ALL enemies. NL Even : Apply !M! Cold to the target.

theWizard:SpellBookOfFrost.NAME: Spell Book Of Frost
theWizard:SpellBookOfFrost.DESCRIPTION: Discard 2 and then draw !M! cards. NL Apply 2 Cold to ALL enemies for each Skill you draw.

theWizard:Launch.NAME: Launch
theWizard:Launch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards and gain [E] [E] . NL Gain 10 Cold . NL Exhaust .

theWizard:Solo.NAME: Solo
theWizard:Solo.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It cost 0 this turn. NL Discard other cards.

theWizard:MagicEight.NAME: Magic Eight
theWizard:MagicEight.DESCRIPTION: If you have less than !M! cards in your hand : Draw cards until you have !M! in your hand. NL Otherwise : Select any number of cards in your hand to discard , then add that many Mana to hand.

theWizard:SideEffect.NAME: Side Effect
theWizard:SideEffect.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever the target is attacked this turn , apply Cold equal to the damage. NL Exhaust .

theWizard:UpgradeMagic.NAME: Upgrade Magic
theWizard:UpgradeMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Mcost 1: Upgrade other cards in your hand.

theWizard:IceThorns.NAME: Ice Thorns
theWizard:IceThorns.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive attack damage, apply !M! Cold to the attacker.

theWizard:FullyArmed.NAME: Fully Armed
theWizard:FullyArmed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 less [E] for every !M! cards besides this card in your hand.

theWizard:IcePrison.NAME: Ice Prison
theWizard:IcePrison.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Cold and !theWizardM! Weak. NL Exhaust.
